snippet: A former executive of the popular dating start-up is suing the company, and its majority owner, IAC/InterActiveCorp, claiming she was subjected to sexual harassment and discrimination.
abstract: Whitney Wolfe, former executive at popular dating start-up Tinder, files lawsuit against company, along with its majority owner IAC/InterActiveCorp, claiming she was subject to sexual harassment and discrimination.
lead_paragraph: A former executive of the popular dating start-up is suing the company, and its majority owner, IAC/InterActiveCorp, claiming she was subjected to sexual harassment and discrimination.

headline.main: Tinder Is Target of Sexual Harassment Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Harassment Suit Targets Maker of a Dating App
